page.shortlink: ux defined controls update source grid
page.description: A pair of buttons for saving changes to the source component and resetting modified controls back to their original values. Used with the "Open UX Component as an alternate editing view for current record" Action Javascript.

discussion.p: Only used if UX component was opened by 'Open UX Component as an alternate editing view for current record' action. Insert a button to update the controls in the source component and another to reset the UX component controls to their original state.
